website_summaries.verdict: A 2-for-1 combo set at a price point that makes a lot of sense.
pros: Customers note the boot bag accommodates large-sized boots as well
Works adequately for most and appreciated for its size
Perfect for throwing in the back of your truck for local treks up the mountain
cons: Given its size, more zippers could improve its ability to fit snowboards

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to check my board and boots to fly to Colorado. I didn't use the boot bag but did what another reviewer did. I bubble wrapped my board, boots and some boarding clothes and just used the board bag. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R

customer_reviews.title: really disappointed--bought it late last year and on first use ...
customer_reviews.text: really disappointed--bought it late last year and on first use for travel this year and ever the zipper failed and spilled my contents--hat, helmet,, gloves into the cargo load of the plane so lost all that and had to buy again at Breck...
customer_reviews.author: CSL

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag combo on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: I used it this year and really liked having the bags. I felt like my single snowboard fit with some extra room. I was able to keep a few other items in there as well. Like my jacket, gloves and hat. The boot bag was the same way. Roomy! Zippers seem good, fabric has a good feel. Aside from not knowing longevity, I have nothing bad to say.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Works well, fits two snowboards <155 CM with bindings ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, fits two snowboards <155 CM with bindings. Boots fit two pairs of boots sz MEN 9 and WOMEN 7 tucked together (L7) Tore during a flight though. NOT padded.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Size 12 boot fits in the boot bag along with helmet and some clothes. Good after two trips over two years. Snowboard bag rips wherever metal from snowboard rubs. So we use duct tape to keep it from splitting and falling out. However, TSA takes duct tape off every time and puts it back, sort of. I think I'll have to sew the duct tape on. Or I can just count this as a loss and buy a better bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Cooke

customer_reviews.title: ZERO padding
customer_reviews.text: No Padding- just canvas bags. We used pipe covers around edge of board for cushion and protection (see pics) but it did make it thru airline travel without a problem. Large enough for board, boots and helmet in the main bag. Did not use the boot bag.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag set
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag set! The boots bag is so huge I can hold my size 9.5 boots (8.5 men's), plus helmet, goggles, gloves, and Go Pro accessories case. The snowboard bag only opens at one end. I didn't realize that when I bought it, but it hasn't been an issue. I would prefer it to open the entire length of the case, but again, it's not really a problem.
customer_reviews.author: 336 FS

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive bag
customer_reviews.text: Having a zipper only at the end makes it difficult to get your board in and out, especially at the end of the day when the board is wet. But if you just need an inexpensive snowboard bag, this one will do the trick. I have used my bag for two seasons and the zippers are all still intact and there are no rips in the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R Weir

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not padded even though I paid for the padded version
customer_reviews.text: Paid extra for the padded version. Not sure I got the padded version because if so I would be scared to see the normal version. The bag is simply thin nylon. The nylon does seem to be stitched well and durable, but without padding, it is essentially pointless for airline travel which is why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rembo Li

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Does the work. It looks OK, not horrible but not like a high quality bag. The thing I do not like about the snowboard sleeve is that the zipper just opens on one end (vs other bags that have zipper going end to end) - besides making a bit more difficult than expected to fit snowboard with bindings, it makes it harder get it to dry after storing a wet snowboard. Would not buy again, would rather spend 2x and getting a dakine or burton.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cesario

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The two cases have no padding, this what i needed! I travel a lot and always check-inthe board. What I do is wrapping the board in bubble wrap and then put it in the bag. I also fit my boot in the same bag. So far I travelled to three destinations without a problem. Great price, great bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Returning this item
customer_reviews.text: The name of the product says padded and this product is not padded with anything what so ever. Would not recommend for travel unless you're padding it with jackets/blankets. But also another review started that this bag broke and spilled all his gear into the cargo hold so idk. Wouldnt chance it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good budget snowboard bag.  Great for trips to the local resorts.
customer_reviews.text: This boot / board bag combo was exactly what I'd hoped for at the price. No insulation, but that's to be expected for what I payed. This set will protect your board and boots from dust and minor abrasion during the off-season, and give you an easy way to carry your gear to the slopes. I wouldn't recommend this set for more than a backseat car ride, but it works well if you just bring your board to the local slopes. I'll update if the bag has any issues, but for now it seems to be a good product. The set was shipped on time, and arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D

customer_reviews.title: Not something you want to use to protect your gear
customer_reviews.text: Both bags will guarantee 0% of any type of protection unless it's strictly for storage. Also - possibly tons of fake reviews
customer_reviews.author: zsiberian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Snowboard sleeve is made just from one layer of fabric, No pads or inserts to protect the snowboard. Low quality. Should cost at least two times less.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Snowboard and boot bag
customer_reviews.text: My son opened this for Christmas this morning! He is ready and excited to hit the slopes.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this to protect my board when I put them in my roof box with other boards works nice and is
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat this board and boot bag combo. As all other reviewers mention, neither bag has any cushioning whatsover, but if you stuff your snowboard pants and jacket they definitely help. It would also be a huge help if the zipper actually unzipped all the way down the snowboard bag rather than a quarter of the way, as this makes putting your board with bindings a bit difficult. But as I said earlier, for the price, you can't beat this combo!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan F

customer_reviews.title: Too thin. My board cut holes in the bag.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something that will protect your board from anything other than scratches, this isn't the bag for you. It is a very thin bag that the board cut holes in the first time I used it. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT PADDED
customer_reviews.text: Not padded! Zippier only partially opens board bag, which makes it hard to use. Boot bag is simple but functional.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barber

customer_reviews.title: These bags are very nice, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very nice, especially for the price. My main reason for getting them was to keep my car dry when putting my board in the trunk at the end of the day. For the most part, it does that except for the zippered area. I think that would be the case for almost any product with a zipper I just wish this had some sort of a seal or something on the inside of the zipper. I may be asking for too much especially at this price but just my thoughts. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan OLeary

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my board
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my board, fits my board/bindings laid flat and my boots stacked on top of each other packed in like shoes when you first buy them. All fit in the tall bag don't even need the boot bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Ok for light use
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for the shorter skis we have. Not the highest quality, it has thin fabric with stinky vinyl liner, and zippers that jam often. But you get what you pay for and it's tolerable for light use.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great bags.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for any avid snowboarder. The board bag is plenty big but wouldn't recommend for airline travel, no padding/protection. The handle is just long enough to get over your shoulder so you can carry other bags in your hand. The boot bag is very roomy, enough extra space (after putting a size 8 boot) for gloves, socks and snow pants.
customer_reviews.author: PoohBearsf

customer_reviews.title: Also came with sweet coupons !
customer_reviews.text: Wondermus! I took it camping with my 148" board and bindings on and had some room for a sleeping bag in between my bindings. The boots bag fit plenty of room for my pants and jacket. Both bags were under 50 with all my stuff and I'm a chick. Also came with a $100 voucher for some wine 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t comment on the quality of the actual product (bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Can’t comment on the quality of the actual product (bought as a gift). But item arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a bit big for the snowboard I have.
customer_reviews.author: Trammie

customer_reviews.title: good bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bag for holding your board(s) and boots. Just realize that there's no shoulder strap for this bag; it is purely a hand carry bag. Given how much it costs, that can be expected and even forgiven. Another reviewer commented on the zippers, and while it's true that the zippers don't fully extend around the bag, you shouldn't have too much trouble with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: It's just a bag
customer_reviews.text: It's just a bag........that's all I was looking for. If you're looking to carry your board from the house to the car etc... Great! If you're looking for protection, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: RazorBreak

customer_reviews.title: Good basic bag for snowboard AND even for waxing table storage!
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I need it for. If I wanted with padding and maybe wheels, I would spend more money on a different bag (which I also have) Also, my Swix waxing table fits in there, which makes it a low cost alternative to Swix's own table bag.
customer_reviews.author: AngryAsianMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very High quality board and boot bag. The straps are solid and it is very durable to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mulkern

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really great value. Would give 5* if the boot bag came with a shoulder strap (there are fabric tabs at the sides where one can be attached). There is no padding in either of the bags, but that was not expected and was not a requirement in my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pressurized Mother

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bag a few times this past snowboarding season and have absolutely zero complaints. It feels sturdy and can fit everything nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Pez

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and functional. If you need to get to/from your local ski area, this is perfect. Probably not great for more than a few trips on a plane, but definitely serves it's purpose relative to the price.
customer_reviews.author: MRMN

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job. No padding but I don't plan on throwing it around. I just got it to protect my board and boots while they're in the garage. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie Law

customer_reviews.title: Great for it's price, but must improvise padding for air travel.
customer_reviews.text: There is no protection for traveling via air. I just taped some cardboard around both tail edges of my snowboard and that worked great. Can't go wrong with the price. It's definitely ideal for traveling with your board if not traveling via air.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Quinn

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic bag, good for the price. I'm sure one with more padding would be better for the board, but we were looking for cheap and this worked.
customer_reviews.author: Rheymamma

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Ordered 2 of these and I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Ordered 2 of these and I am able to get 2 snowboards in each bag and 2 sets of boots into the boot bags. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jaime

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: tarp-like. go to a local shop and spend $100 on something quality
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Solid set.
customer_reviews.text: Fits both my and my daughters snowboards, the bag fits both our boots as well, even though just barely. Does not offer any padding abut a great way to transport your equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Va- Bank

customer_reviews.title: The snowboard bag worked great for my trip
customer_reviews.text: The snowboard bag worked great for my trip. I was able to fit my 160 cm board with my boots, jacket, and pants all in the bag. I did not use the separate boots bag do to trying to condense everything. The bag protected all of my gear and did not rip flying from Chicago to Dallas to Vancouver and back. Very Satisfied for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags Set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bag set! It fits his board, boots, helmet and goggles with a bit of room to spare. Nice Build and seems durable
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: got this for my ski trip and works great, now if only the airport would stop losing ...
customer_reviews.text: got this for my ski trip and works great, now if only the airport would stop losing my stuff
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: great bag. not padded but still high quality
customer_reviews.text: great bag. not padded but still high quality. I was able to fit my board (154) with the bindings attached to it inside the bag easily.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: can't beat this for the price. I would probly be willing to pay an extra $10 if it had some pockets in the boot bag (for chap stick and pass holder, etc). Still, this is very good quality and fits my husband's boots and board just great.
customer_reviews.author: Monarch

customer_reviews.title: Successful purchase for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grand son used the bag for the snowboard on a trip out west. It worked well so he was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: P.  Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a bag that will allow you to check your snowboard and boots this is the ideal package. It may not have the best padding but all I did was wrap my jacket and pants around the edges to avoid damage. There is only one side that opens up which makes packing a bit difficult. The boot bag is also large enough to fit other items as well. Another pro is it is very light weight and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: but it's great to carry my board in
customer_reviews.text: No cushion in the snowboard sleeve, but it's great to carry my board in. Overall I think it's a great deal. The boot bag is large enough to fit my boots, gloves, and socks..not my helmet of course.
customer_reviews.author: RossMobBoss

customer_reviews.title: Great value, served my well on a Southwest flight ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value, served my well on a Southwest flight earlier this year. Note, my 163cm board is a pretty tight fit here. I would recommend to High Sierra that they offer an "xl" version.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pappas

customer_reviews.title: ... first set is on it's 4th season and doing great!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set- our first set is on it's 4th season and doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S.

customer_reviews.title: spacious
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve is quite spacious! It not only fit my board, but it also manage to fit my jacket, pants, and a few other pairs of clothing. The boot bag also managed to fit my boots, helmet, bindings, gloves, and goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Vick Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially considering how cheap it is
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially considering how cheap it is. The bags are a thick canvas that has strong seams. I doubt these will be tearing or breaking down for a long time. Amazing bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Keeps boards and boots from getting scratched while transporting to and from the mountain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and stitches are good. Can't wait to bring it to big bear ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, and stitches are good. Can't wait to bring it to big bear with my new board!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia0420

customer_reviews.title: nothing better. Not any padding
customer_reviews.text: For the price, nothing better. Not any padding, but easily fits a large blanket to protect board.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material and I would say its more of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material and I would say its more of a light weight bag for a day trip. Now I need to purchase a heavy duty bag with wheels for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy !
customer_reviews.text: If you are a snowboarder you're going to want this set. Great to carry stuff back and forth and stowe board in off-season. Lots of extra room in boot bag for other stuff and protects board well. An expensive bag is really not needed when this does the trick. We've used the same bag for four years without a problem so I bought another after my son lost his bag last year. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits nicely into this bag, makes carrying her stuff much easier on my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Miracles

customer_reviews.title: Bag zippers
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag, it does the job. The zipper only opens on the top though so if you're bindings are attached to the board it's kinda a pain. Good for holding just boards though and big enough to hold several.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great high quality product. I recommend this to anyone who wants bags for their gear! The only Con is that there is no padding, but I didn't really need that.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag for storage and transport. Bag fits all my gear and my massive board
customer_reviews.author: k.j. spearman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sons been using these for two seasons and have held up so far veey well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good product. The boot/helmet bag is a great addition to the package.
customer_reviews.author: LAF

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Ski Club!
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty bag, fits my sons 153cm board. Boot bag holds boots, helmet, gloves, jacket pants .... This is great for his ski club, protects equipment and is easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory D. R

customer_reviews.title: Love. Need it to store the snow board at ...
customer_reviews.text: Love. Need it to store the snow board at home, tits perfectly for my 154cm snow board(with room to spare). The boot bag fits size 10 pair of boots and helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Great price and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great price and durable, which are mostly what I was looking for, since I don't need many features. Was very nice to just check my board and boots on Southwest (as a single bag) and not have to worry about renting a board.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hobson

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: does the job, i was just hoping there was a way to attach the boot bag to the board bag but there isnt.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Exacty what I needed and more
customer_reviews.text: I already have a snowboard bag so I was mainly looking for a boot bag. This was cheaper than a boot bag by itself and now I have a spare snowboard bag too! The boot bag is roomy enough to fit my helmet and gloves, etc too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Yuey

customer_reviews.title: Sierra snowboard bag.
customer_reviews.text: I got these last year for the kids Christmas gift. It serve the purpose of transporting it in the car. Still have to clean off the snow and ice off before putting it in. Convenient for the kids when loading up the car. There happy.
customer_reviews.author: TA Ling

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I did not get what was ordered. The bags are not padded like they are titled.
customer_reviews.author: Cerina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan N

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how well my snow board and stuff fit in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: LBmomma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal for this. Used it to travel and worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: It seems just right. Do not know how rugged ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems just right. Do not know how rugged it is because bought it after the snow season ended. I hope it holds up to teenager use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit. Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Tough to get my board with bindings on in the bag. My board is a 154 bindings are medium burton customs if you have large bindings I don't know that you'll get them to fit. Would be nice if there were pockets on the side for putting gloves and goggles. Material seems durable and zippers are smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: A bit misfits on my gears. However, due ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit misfits on my gears. However, due to the price range, I would say the company is trying to design one size for all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These work great for our boards. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nika DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 1-2 boards w binding Show bag is great too !
customer_reviews.author: US

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag! It does a great job protecting my snowboard during travel and when j storage in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: NightProwler

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice thin light weight bag. It is perfect for a day trip to the slopes. The boot bag holds a lot more then just the boots. The Snowboard is a little long, but still good for carrying the board.
customer_reviews.author: Slayton S Stewart

customer_reviews.title: cheap and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: the zipper broke before I even got to the airport
customer_reviews.author: joe hornback

customer_reviews.title: ... USED IT A FEW TIMES BUT SO FAR I'VE LIKED IT!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ONLY USED IT A FEW TIMES BUT SO FAR I'VE LIKED IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's #1 Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived on time and is of good quality. The large bag easily fits a snowboard ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and is of good quality. The large bag easily fits a snowboard d and the smaller has plenty of room for snowboard or ski boots.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really protect your gear, it's basically just a bag to carry stuff around, no padding.
customer_reviews.author: Diego D. Zaks B

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: No padding in either but can fit a 163 with binding with no problems and boot bag has a little extra room to fit gogles, wax, multitool, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: Best bag combo for the money
customer_reviews.text: No padding but definitely best bang for the buck, no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Deadelephant

customer_reviews.title: Fits my board with bindings, no problem. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my board with bindings, no problem. The other square bag is spacious enough for your boots and maybe helmet/gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this combo set for my husband for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this combo set for my husband for Christmas last year and he loves it. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshlin Schade

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, but the snowboard bags started to rip after one round-trip flight.
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: Great combo
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this combo to store and carry my board and shoes. Both are way bigger for my gears, but that simply means more room to fit everything else. For example, I can leave my helmet, goggles, and gloves in the shoe bag as well. Pretty much everything I need for snowboarding, I can fit them into one of the two cases. One minor downside is that the zipper on the board case doesn't open all the way - it's very short and only cover one of the width. This makes putting in and taking out the board a little more difficult, but still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: whoosh

customer_reviews.title: The snowboard bad kept my snowboard inside
customer_reviews.text: The snowboard bad kept my snowboard inside. The boot bag kept my boots inside. And that's all I got to say about that.
customer_reviews.author: ChasFF28

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift and the quality of these 2 pieces was great, I would recommend this product to any snowboader.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: the bag are perfect, I can put 2 small snowboard in one ...
customer_reviews.text: the bag are perfect, I can put 2 small snowboard in one bag and the boot bag can handle one boot and helm together. Very recommended
customer_reviews.author: starr

customer_reviews.title: Good for storage
customer_reviews.text: Good, low cost board and boot bag. No padding but perfect for storing equipment. I'd be wary about using this bag to check my board to a destination however.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not cushioned but good quality fabric, good varying case. Keeps my car dry.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Garcia

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Son needed a boot and snowboard bag and this is perfect. Not super thick fabric but does the job. Can not complain for this price!!
customer_reviews.author: Robynn

customer_reviews.title: Easily fits my board
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special but does the job. Easily fits my board, boots, pants, jacket, and helmet all in the board bag for easy storage and travel
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not Padded
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT PADDED as it says in the opening description.
customer_reviews.author: Christelle

customer_reviews.title: Great bags at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Worked great during last snowboard season. Now my gear is neatly in these bags in my closet awaiting next season.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S Lee

customer_reviews.title: Affordable bag set for your snowboard and boots
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for the first time this past weekend. My 155cm snowboard with large bindings fit into the bag with no issues and room to spare. Boot bag held my size 10 (Men) snowboard boots just fine. Both bags have extra space, which will allow you to store more than just your snowboard and boots in them. Material feels durable enough to provide some protection. Inside liner seems to prevent escape of melted snow. No tears or any noticable damage after a weekend to the snow...
customer_reviews.author: Geraldo

product_meta.title: High Sierra Snowboard Sleeve & Boot Bag Combo
feature_bullets: EASY ACCESS SLEEVE - Zippered opening and holds a single snowboard up to 165 cm.
CONVENIENT - Boot bag holds a single pair of ski boots up to size 13.
CARE - Wipe clean with damp cloth
DURABLE -Water-resistant fabric. Self-repairing nylon coil zippers.
